column5: including children from 6 different villages were taken to hospital on May 17
column6: 2019 in Maung Russey district after eating crabs bought from the local market.------After taking the crustaceans home to cook
column7: people began suffering   from extreme diarrhea and vomiting
column8: and were independently taken to Maung Russey Referral Hospital. Luckily the poisonings were not life threatening.------People in the area are advised to stay away from shellfish.------*It’s not stated which crabs were involved
column9: but as it is a long way from the sea
column10: most likely mudcrabs.------Pictures of sick people: ------https://kbn.news/archives/123258
